Question:
Why is the RA2L1/RA2E1/RA2E2/RA2E3/RA2A2 suitable for battery applications?
Answer:
The RA2L1/RA2E1/RA2E2/RA2E3/RA2A2 delivers lower operating current  and  standby current with quick wake up time. In SNOOZE mode the CPU is in the standby state while A/D conversion and serial communication are enabled, and the CPU is activated only when required. This mode is excellent for battery-powered systems as it greatly increases battery life.
Suitable Products
RA2L1, RA2E1, RA2E2, RA2E3, RA2A2
